snippet.title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the thrilling announcement trailer for Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin, an upcoming real-time strategy game coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

In Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin, which is set in the fantasy universe of Age of Sigmar, you will command four unique factions in dynamic real-time battles. The RTS game also features a story-driven single-player campaign, as well as the ability for you to compete in 1v1 and 2v2 cross-platform online multiplayer modes.

Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin is set in Ghur, the savage Realm of Beasts, an inhospitable, violent land where only the strongest survive. In the single-player campaign, the forces of Order dispatch the celestial, reforged champions known as the Stormcast Eternals to reclaim this realm. After establishing a precarious foothold in this dangerous place, their fortress settlement is under serious threat from the Kruleboyz, the sinister and violent Orruk faction who call Ghur their home. When this Stormcast detachment’s leader, Sigrun, learns about a source of arcane power that can protect against the Kruleboyz, they venture into the swamplands at great risk to obtain it – beginning the campaign’s twisted cinematic tale of desperate survival.

#Warhammer #WarhammerAgeOfSigmarRealmsOfRuin
